ExampleDefinition.Title: RealTime Ghosted Traces
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: This example shows persistence of old traces giving a 'ghosted' effect. As new series are drawn older series are made increasingly transparent until they become invisible. This example uses a background-thread Timer with variable interval of 20ms - 500ms to demonstrate the effect.
